txt.en:
'There is no rest for the wicked, [placeholder]. There is much yet to do.....mainly getting forces here to stand against the enemy.

'We need a fire so big that Lugb√∫rz will take notice! Ha! On the western parapet, we will build a massive beacon and call our reinforcements!

'Get your brethren together and bring us the wood we need to build that pyre. Go now, maggot!'

'We will build a fire and they will come. The western bridge will be safe! Best you think on this in the future, whelp. We might often have need of this type of defensive service.\n\n'Best to be prepared, no?'
'Get out there, sluggard! You've a job to do!'
Angmar claims the central keep of the Ettenmoors, but the main army has yet to receive the news. The War-tyrant has ordered his soldiers to collect the materials needed to set a large beacon fire.
'Get the boys from the camp! Defend this wretched hole!'
Deliver the materials to Soldier Kaasak at Tol Ascarnen

Head south of Tol Ascarnen into Hithlad and the Grimwood forest to collect the wood needed to build the blaze.\n\nThough your forces took Tol Ascarnen, the keep is woefully undefended, and Kaasak has ordered you to build a pyre to call in reinforcements from the west. You should make your way into the Ettenmoors and search for kindling, timber, and larger logs to build a beacon fire large enough to call in reinforcements to Tol Ascarnen.
